title: Episode #23: Is modern day marketing hurting our health?
description: Fast food advertising is everywhere. Could this be contributing to the obesity problem? In this episode I discuss the affects of marketing on the mind and body. For more info, check out ch 5 in my book THINK AND EAT YOURSELF SMART: https://bit.ly/2qXA9MH
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
